SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT review_num,review_writer,review_title,review_content,viewcount,TO_CHAR(review_regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS review_regdate, star FROM review WHERE space_num = #{space_num} ORDER BY review_num DESC) result1)
WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNum} AND rnum <= #{endRowNum}

SELECT review_num,review_writer,review_title,review_content,viewcount,TO_CHAR(review_regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS review_regdate, reserv_num, star FROM review WHERE users_num=#{users_num} ORDER BY review_num

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT review_num, review_writer, review_title, review_content, viewcount, TO_CHAR(review_regdate, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS review_regdate, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY review_num) AS rnum FROM review WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM seller_space WHERE review.space_num = seller_space.space_num AND seller_space.users_num = (SELECT MAX(users_num) FROM space_users WHERE id=#{sellerId}) ) )
WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}
SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM seller_space INNER JOIN review ON review.space_num = seller_space.space_num WHERE seller_space.users_num=(SELECT MAX(users_num) FROM space_users WHERE id=#{sellerId})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_num, review_writer, review_title, review_content, viewcount, review_regdate, users_num, space_num, reserv_num, star) VALUES (review_seq.NEXTVAL, #{review_writer}, #{review_title}, #{review_content}, #{viewcount}, SYSDATE,#{users_num}, #{space_num}, #{reserv_num}, #{star})
